description:
This is a unique course giving an insiders view of a subject that is rarely discussed. All too often, people know so little what makes a good marriage. Divorce creeps up on them and they are ill-equipped to deal with the complexities of the divorce process and the subsequent psychological toll that the divorce exacts on all parties.

As a student, you will see the inside of the divorce process. You will also learn about smart alternatives to the trial process. There are some valuable resources that will assist in the process.

The course is divided into 4 sections moving from divorce statistics to the actual divorce process and living and thriving afterward

Anyone who is curious about how a divorce may work, or if they feel vulnerable should rush to get into this course. It will help all of you as students.
title: Marriage is hard, Divorce is harder
